name: gmail-notifier
description: Multi-account Gmail notifier (without storing passwords locally)
author: InBasic

preferences.name: resetPeriod
preferences.title: Remind for all unread emails every (minutes):
preferences.description: Set the value to zero for no periodic reminders. Minimum period is 5 minutes. [Important note] Non-zero value fires both desktop notification and alert sound eternally if you have unread email(s) exactly similar to new email arrival.

preferences.name: initialPeriod
preferences.title: Do not check for new emails on Firefox startup for (seconds):
preferences.description: Set the value to zero for no email check until the first manual refresh (middle-click on the toolbar button)

preferences.name: notification
preferences.title: Display desktop notification for new emails:

preferences.name: notificationTime
preferences.title: Show desktop notification for (seconds):
preferences.description: This option may not work based on your OS.

preferences.name: notificationTruncate
preferences.title: Truncate notification text for [title] and [summary] fields:
preferences.description: If you don't want the ellipsis truncation, use a big number here.

preferences.name: alert
preferences.title: Play alert sound for new emails:
preferences.description: Note for Mac users. From Firefox 28.0, all desktop notifications are handled by Mac Notification Center which causes one extra sound alert. You need to either uncheck this sound notification or the one that is generated by the Notification Center.

preferences.name: tray
preferences.title: Display Windows taskbar notification (beta):
preferences.description: Taskbar notifications are only supported in Windows OS at the moment.

preferences.name: doTrayCallback
preferences.title: Open toolbar panel when click on the taskbar notification icon (beta):
preferences.description: This feature is highly experimental and might make your Firefox browser unstable. [Restart required]

preferences.name: alphabetic
preferences.title: Sort account selections alphabetically:
preferences.description: The default order type is logged-in order

preferences.name: sound
preferences.title: User defined notification sound (*.WAV or *.OGG):
preferences.description: If Firefox is not playing the notification sound, try to convert it into a plain WAV format using an online conversion tool.

preferences.name: soundVolume
preferences.title: Specifies the sound volume for the notification:
preferences.description: Volume is a number between 0 to 100 where 100 is the highest volume (default)

preferences.name: searchMode
preferences.title: Search for open Gmail account only on the active window:
preferences.description: Do not search other browser windows for open Gmail accounts. If Gmail is not open in the active window, open a new tab.

preferences.name: relatedToCurrent
preferences.title: Open new Gmail account next to the active tab:

preferences.name: currentTab
preferences.title: Open Gmail account in the active tab:

options.label: Open Gmail account if only one account is logged-in

preferences.name: size
preferences.title: Toolbar panel mode:
preferences.description: Full-content view mode is still experimental feature.

preferences.name: forceVisible
preferences.title: Always try to keep toolbar button visible:
preferences.description: Only available for Firefox 28.0 or less

preferences.name: onGmailNotification
preferences.title: Do not show desktop notification to warn that Gmail website is already open:
